create en empty migration file with name myplay


python3 manage.py makemigrations --empty play --name myplay

0002_myplay.py

# Generated by Django 2.2.6 on 2022-10-11 05:48

from django.db import migrations

def full_description(apps, schema_editor):
    Courses = apps.get_model('play', 'Course')
    for course in Courses.objects.all():
        course.fullname = '%s %s' % (course.crs_name , course.crs_description)
        course.save()

class Migration(migrations.Migration):

    dependencies = [
        ('play', '0001_initial'),
    ]

    operations = [
      migrations.RunPython(full_description),
    ]


python3 manage.py makemigrations

python3 manage.py migrate

python3 manage.py sqlmigrate play 0001_initial
